generated.css: *{box-sizing:border-box}a,p,span{font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,Open Sans,Helvetica Neue,sans-serif;font-size:.5rem}a,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,span{margin:0;padding:0}a{text-decoration:none}ul>li{list-style:none}body{background-color:#fff;margin:0;padding:0}.top{background:#979797;background:#929393;background:linear-gradient(180deg,#929393,#fff 50%,#929393);border-radius:.65625rem;height:9.53125rem;margin:.625rem auto 0;width:18.75rem}.top p{color:#000;font-weight:700;margin:14px 0;text-align:center}.top p.large-title{font-size:2.1875rem;text-transform:uppercase}.top p.small-title{font-size:2.09375rem}.middle-wrap{display:flex;justify-content:center;margin:.46875rem .625rem 6.5625rem .375rem}.middle-wrap .trip-info{border:1px solid #222;border-radius:.3125rem;height:9.375rem;margin-right:.625rem;padding:.9375rem 0 0 .28125rem;width:9.6875rem}.middle-wrap .trip-info p{color:#000;font-weight:700;text-align:left}.middle-wrap .trip-info p.trip-num{font-size:1.15625rem;margin-bottom:.8125rem}.middle-wrap .trip-info p.trip-person{font-size:1.3125rem}.middle-wrap .trip-code{max-height:9.6875rem;max-width:9.6875rem}.middle-wrap .trip-code img{width:100%}.time-wrap{text-align:center}.time-wrap p{font-size:1.40625rem;font-weight:700}.time-wrap p.time{margin-bottom:.46875rem}#colorBar{animation:blink 1s infinite step-start;display:flex;justify-content:center;margin-top:.625rem;width:100%}#colorBar .color{height:1.5625rem;width:6.46875rem}@keyframes blink{0%{opacity:1}to{opacity:1}50%{opacity:0}}footer{align-items:flex-end;display:flex;margin-top:.8125rem;width:100%}footer .back{color:#007bf9;font-size:1rem;margin:0 1.75rem;vertical-align:middle}footer .count-down{color:#000;font-size:1.1875rem;font-weight:700}.footer-after{height:.9375rem;width:100%}#colorInput>form{display:none}#colorInput>form.active{display:block}
